name: chronicle-sync
description: A secure, cross-platform browser extension for syncing browsing data

scripts.test:e2e: NODE_ENV=test pnpm run build && pnpm exec playwright test --config=playwright.ci.config.ts
scripts.test:e2e:ci: NODE_ENV=test pnpm run build && pnpm exec playwright test --config=playwright.ci.config.ts
scripts.test:e2e:sauce: NODE_ENV=test pnpm run build && pnpm exec playwright test --config=playwright.sauce.config.ts
scripts.test:e2e:dashboard: NODE_ENV=test pnpm run build:dashboard && pnpm exec playwright test --config=playwright.ci.config.ts tests/e2e/frontend/dashboard.test.ts
scripts.build: pnpm run build:extension && pnpm run build:worker
scripts.build:extension: webpack --mode production && mkdir -p dist/extension && mv dist/*.js dist/*.html dist/manifest.json dist/extension/ && ([ -d dist/icons ] && mv dist/icons dist/extension/ || true)
scripts.build:worker: rm -rf dist/worker dist-worker && mkdir -p dist/worker dist-worker && webpack --config webpack.worker.js --mode production && cp dist/worker/worker.js dist-worker/
scripts.deploy:staging: pnpm exec wrangler deploy --config wrangler.worker.toml --env staging dist/worker/worker.js
scripts.deploy:prod: pnpm exec wrangler deploy --config wrangler.worker.toml --env production dist/worker/worker.js
scripts.deploy:dashboard:staging: pnpm exec wrangler pages publish dist/dashboard --project-name chronicle-sync-dashboard --branch staging
scripts.deploy:dashboard:prod: pnpm exec wrangler pages publish dist/dashboard --project-name chronicle-sync-dashboard --branch main

author: OpenHands
